heading: HR02151
0: A RESOLUTION TO CONDUCT AN IMMEDIATE INVESTIGATION AND/OR INQUIRY IN AID OF LEGISLATION, DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES IN CONNECTION TO THE DAMAGED LEARNING MATERIALS DISCOVERED AT LEXICON INC.
